segments.text: Tomorrow I will be the new owner of all dad's assets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It still feels really strange to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . I miss him terribly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How does it feel to be in charge of so much money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought I would feel like I was in the lap of Luxury .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess you could choose that if you wanted .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I think I will run things much the same way that Dad did .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dad really knew what he was doing when he chose you to take over for him when he was gone !
segments.speaker: S2
